title: 151 - Gay Marriage, Wedding Cakes, and Religious Liberty with Skye Jethani
description:
Our friend Skye Jethani joins us to discuss the recent SCOTUS decision regarding the baker in Colorado who refused to bake a wedding cake for a gay couple. We had a very interesting conversation regarding gay marriage, love of neighbor, and religious liberty.

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
